Package eu.fbk.knowledgestore.datastore

DataStore server-side component API (ks-server).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataStore
    A persistent storage component for resource, mention, entity, axiom and context records.
    DataTransaction
    A DataStore transaction.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CachingDataStore
    A DataStore wrapper providing a transactional and a global cache for looked up and modified records.
    ForwardingDataStore
    A DataStore forwarding all its method calls to another DataStore.
    ForwardingDataTransaction
    A DataTransaction forwarding all its method calls to another DataTransaction.
    LoggingDataStore
    A DataStore wrapper that log calls to the operations of a wrapped DataStore and their execution times.
    LoggingDataStore.LoggingDataTransaction  
    MemoryDataStore
    A DataStore implementations that keeps all data in memory, with persistence provided by loading / saving data to file.
    MySQLDataStore
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
    SolrDataStore
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
    SynchronizedDataStore
    A DataStore wrapper that synchronizes and enforces a proper access to an another DataStore.
    TripleDataStore  

Package eu.fbk.knowledgestore.datastore Description

DataStore server-side component API (ks-server).

This package defines the API of the DataStore internal server-side component, whose responsibility is to provide a scalable storage for semi-strutured data about resources, mentions and entities. More in details, the package provides:

  • the DataStore API (DataStore, DataTransaction);
  • a base implementation (MemoryDataStore) that stores all data in memory in a space inefficient way (this implementation is good for testing);
  • abstract classes ForwardingDataStore and ForwardingDataTransaction for implementing the decorator pattern;
  • three concrete decorator classes that wrap another DataStore and add it logging capabilities (LoggingDataStore), synchronization ( SynchronizedDataStore) and per-transaction caching ( CachingDataStore).

Custom implementations of the DataStore component may be provided by the user to customize the way the KnowledgeStore stores its data.
